name: Little Oxidized Sterling Silver Ancient Chinese Key Amulet
description:
This ancient Chinese Key pendant necklace was handcrafted and cast in sterling silver by A.E.Kendrick, San Diego jewelry designer and metalsmith. Using recycled fine silver, she makes sterling silver by adding the finest alloy available, and casts employing the ancient art of lost wax casting. The original key was molded in rubber, vulcanized, and injected with wax. This wax was cast in sterling silver, although any metal can be used. 

Suspended form a 26" sterling silver anchor chain, oxidized by hand and tumbled for shine, a simple hand-forged bail unites the amulet. 

This one-of-a-kind necklace will bring you good luck and ward off evil spirits on your next adventure…


Dimensions Approx.

- 17mm by 3.5cm sterling silver key, mixed by hand with alloy S57NA ( from United Metals, New York)

- 26" sterling silver anchor chain, made in Italy, purchased locally. Lobster clasp. 


Please contact the Shop for custom necklace lengths, metals, or finishes!

name: Sterling Silver Ancient Chinese Key Amulet
description:
An ancient Chinese key was cast in sterling silver using the art of  lost wax casting. The key is suspended from an Italian made anchor chain, and even the bail is hand forged by the artist and owner of Wanderlust Artifacts, A.E.B. Kendrick. Only the highest quality alloy was used( S57NA), ensuring this piece will never tarnish. 

Amulets are worn for good luck and ward off evil spirits that may be lurking about…


Dimensions approx.
- 26" Italian anchor chain, 4mm links
- 1.8 by 5cm key

Your necklace will arrive in a beautiful gold jewelry box, made in USA. 
For more shipping information visit my shop policies page:

name: Adjustable Sterling Silver Midi Cuff Ring- Made in USA
description:
This delicate midi ring was created from sterling silver- hand mixed fine silver with master alloy S57NA which resists tarnishing. These metals were mixed using a torch and a sheet ingot was poured, then rolled through the mill until the sheet was the proper gauge, and finally roller printed with a pebbled texture.  The design was traced onto the metal sheet, which was pierced and cut using a jeweler' saw. This simple, but unusual ring does not close for adjustability, and could also be worn as an ear cuff, if so desired. 

Dimensions approx:

Ring measures 14mm by 14mm and is 10mm in height.

name: Art Nouveau Swarovski Crystals and Freshwater Pearls on Gold Chain Bridal Headpiece
description:
This Art Nouveau Bridal Headpiece was inspired by Alphonse Mucha and is custom made with 14k gold- filled chain, freshwater pearls and Swarovski Crystals in Golden Shadow. Three strands of genuine natural freshwater pearls on gold-filled chain mix with two strands of genuine Swarovski crystals for incredible sparkle. All strands unite over the ear, where 3 sequin discs ( 14K gold-filled ) add extra movement. This piece is made to order, ready in approx. 2-3 weeks. 

Dimensions Approx.

-Headpiece: 21" in circumference, extending to 23" , or contact Shop for custom sizes.
-Natural Freshwater Pearls: twenty-nine 4mm pearls, six 6mm pearls, fifteen 8mm pearls, and one 12mm pearl.
-Sequin Discs: 3.8mm, 4.9mm and 7mm all 14K gold-filled and made in USA.
-Chain: 2.1 mm gold-filled chain, made in USA.

About Alphonse Mucha: 
Alphonse Mucha was a Czech Art Nouveau painter and artist, born in Moravia in 1806. He produced many posters, advertisements, paintings, illustrations, and postcards. 
To learn more about Alphonse Mucha visit http://www.muchafoundation.org/about/about

Your headpiece will arrive in a beautiful gold jewelry box, made in USA. 
For more shipping information visit Wanderlust Artifact's shop policies page

name: Sterling Silver Bangle Bracelet Trio- Made in USA
description:
These unique bangles are custom made to the size you request to insure the perfect fit. Fabricated and hand-forged from square sterling sliver and completely made from scratch, beginning with fine silver and adding alloy S57NA which resists tarnishing, the metals were mixed by hand using a torch and once melted poured into an ingot. This was rolled out into square wire, roller printed for texture and soldered. The middle bangle was oxidized and hammered into an octagonal shape. All bangles were buffed and polished by hand to a satin finish. Stamped with a quality mark.  

*Hint for getting the correct size: 1) Measure the inside diameter of another bangle bracelet that fits right. 2) Measure the widest part of your hand in a curved position used to put on a bangle with a string, then measure the string to get the interior circumference.

name: Freshwater Pearl and Purple Koi Fish Pendant Necklace on Sterling Silver Chain
description:
This whimsical articulated koi fish pendant is wire-wrapped by hand with a natural freshwater pearl on an 18 inch long 100% recycled sterling silver 1.3mm flat cable chain. This necklace is makes a great everyday necklace, and is the perfect gift for anyone who needs a little encouragement...

Necklace Dimensions:
-18 inch chain, 1.3mm per link. Sterling Silver, 100% recycled. Made in America.
-Finishes with a sterling silver lobster clasp. Made in Italy. 
-The fish is 3.5 cm long. Imported from China.
- Sterling Silver wire, wrapped by hand for strength and durability. 
- The 7-7.5mm natural freshwater pearl was chosen for its iridescent luster and may have some naturally occurring irregularities.

About the necklace:
The Koi Fish in Japanese culture represents non-conformity,strength in times of adversity, persistence and surpassing expectations. 

Your Koi Fish Necklace will be shipped Priority Mail and will arrive in 2-3 business days with tracking and insurance. Your necklace be carefully packaged and will arrive within a beautiful red and gold Chinese Envelope. 

For other lengths contact the Shop for a custom order.

name: "Beautiful" Freshwater Pearl and Textured Sterling Silver Disc Necklace- Made in USA
description:
A single natural freshwater pearl and textured hand-forged sterling silver disc are wire- wrapped by hand for superior durability. Together they dangle from a delicate 1.3mm 100% recycled silver chain. The disc has a pebbled or reptilian texture on one side, on the other is hand stamped the Chinese symbol for "beautiful" and has been oxidized and scratch finished. This pearl necklace is perfect for everyday wear and special occasions alike.

Dimensions Approx.

-Necklace chain- 18" 1.3mm 100 % recycled sterling silver chain and clasp. Please convo shop for other lengths. 

-Natural Freshwater Pearl- 7.7.5mm, has a natural irregular shape and iridescent luster. Imported.

Sterling Siver Disc - 13mm disc- I mixed the fine silver with the alloy myself to ensure the highest quality materials were used. 

-Sterling Silver wire and lobster clasps, made in USA. 

This hand- crafted necklace will be shipped Priority mail ( 2-3 days for US orders ) and will arrive in a gold and red Chinese paper envelope.

Made to order.

name: Rough Sterling Silver Ring- Handcrafted in America
description:
Raw masculinity for the refined, well- traveled gent. This sterling silver ring has a rough and raw appearance, balanced by the symmetry of the design. It was meticulously carved by hand from wax and cast using the ancient technique of lost wax casting. A silver coin was metled down, and the alloy S57NA was added. After this ring was cast, pits where drilled, soldered, and hammered to create the tough uneven texture. Please bear in mind that each ring is cast individually and will vary ever so slightly. After receiving payment, please allow 2-3 weeks to completion. 

Dimensions Approx.
-Ring size : ( pictured ring is size 10.5,  your ring will be made to order in the size you request) 
-Ring head is 2.5cm by 1.9 cm 
-Weight: 25.7 grams composed of 92.5 % fine silver, 7.5% S57NA 
(a new- age master alloy that requires less polishing)

Shipped with tracking and insurance provided, priority mail for US clients.  Will arrive in a gold box ready for gifting or storing, made in America.

name: Freshwater Pearl and Yellow/Gold Koi Fish Pendant Necklace on 16" recycled Sterling Silver Chain
description:
This whimsical articulated yellow/gold koi fish pendant is wire-wrapped by hand with a natural freshwater pearl, and together they dangle from a delicate 16 in. chain, made of 100% recycled sterling silver, This necklace is a unique addition to anyone's collection, and is the perfect gift for anyone who like the koi fish, also swims upstream...

Necklace Dimensions:
- 16 inch chain, 1.3mm per link. Made in America. 100% recycled sterling silver.
- Finishes with a sterling silver lobster clasp. Made in Italy. 
- The fish is 3.5 cm long. Imported from China.
- Sterling Silver wire, wrapped by hand for strength and durability. 
- Natural freshwater pearl, 7-7.5mm, imported from China, was chosen for its iridescent luster, and may have some naturally occurring irregularities. 

About the necklace:
The Koi Fish in Japanese culture represents non-conformity, strength in times of adversity, persistence and surpassing expectations. 

Your Koi Fish Necklace will be shipped Priority Mail and will arrive in 2-3 business days with tracking and insurance. Your necklace be carefully packaged and will arrive within a beautiful red and gold Chinese Envelope. 


For other lengths contact the Shop for a custom order.

name: Art Deco Swarovski Crystals and Freshwater Pearls on Gold Chain Bridal Headpiece
description:
This Art Deco bridal headpiece features shimmering Golden Shadow Swarovski Elements, two genuine natural freshwater pearls, and glittering 14K gold-filled sequin discs on each side. Handcrafted using 14K gold-filled chain, this headpiece finishes with a lobster clasp and has an adjustable length of chain with a single pear shaped crystal added for weight. 

Dimensions Approx.
-Headpiece circumference: 20.5 inches, adjustable to 21 and 21.5 inches. Contact Shop for custom sizes. 
-Chain: 2.1mm 14K gold- filled, made in USA, for for information visit my shop policies page:
https://www.etsy.com/your/shops/WanderlustArtifacts/policies
-Swarovski Disc: 14mm, in Golden Shadow,  imported from Austria.
-Swarovski Crystals: 6mm, in Golden Shadow, imported from Austia.
-Pearls: 5mm genuine natural freshwater pearls.
-Lobster Clasp: 8.3mm, 14K gold-filled, made in USA.
-Sequin Discs: 3.8mm, 4.9mm and 7mm all 14K gold-filled and made in USA.

Your headpiece arrive in a beautiful gold jewelry box, also made in USA.
